newsitem.title: GREECE: ATHLETICS-RIEDEL CLINCHES FOURTH WORLD DISCUS TITLE.
newsitem.headline: ATHLETICS-RIEDEL CLINCHES FOURTH WORLD DISCUS TITLE.

text.p: German Lars Riedel clinched his fourth successive world men's discus title on Sunday with a throw nearly two metres ahead of his nearest rival.
The Olympic champion threw the discus 68.54 metres to take first place ahead of Virgilijus Alekna of Lithuania who had a best mark of 66.70 metres.
Juergen Schult, a former Olympic, world and European champion who like Riedel competed for the former East Germany, was third with 66.14.
